Subject: How to upload SSL Certificate.
Description:
Hello Team,

What is the process for uploading the server certificate on the EPP Server? We are encountering an unsecured connection error when attempting to access the EPP console.

Thanks,  
Pravin.
What_We_Know__c: Client wants to know how to upload their own SSL certificate to get rid of the unsecure connection error for the EPP server.
Next_Steps__c: Sent out an e-mail with instructions on how to add the cert body and key to the EPP server settings and now we wait for their response.
Solution_Comment__c: Client confirmed the issue with the SSL certificate has been sorted after following the instructions.
